src_original: cittasaṃpīḍanārthena daurmanasyam /  upakleśārthena upāyāsāḥ /
tgt_original: 逼惱心義故不適，隨煩惱分義故苦惱。

src_original: punastattvāparijñetyādi tu parīkṣārthaṃ pradarśanārtham uktam /  punastattvāparijñānāda vidyāderyathākramam /  pūrvapūrvebhya utpādo 'pyākhyātaścottarottaraḥ /  tattvāparijñānaṃ tu apratipattirvipratipattiśca /
tgt_original: 如是不隨實相故則隨邪行，無知故則無明，如是無明故生三種行，則是善、不善、無記。

src_original: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ vibhinnāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,  apuṇyopagāḥ,  āneñjyopagāḥ/
tgt_original: 有如是等行故，有善識、不善識、無記識，以是故行緣識。

src_original: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmapuṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  āneñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmāneñjyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  idamucyate vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam /
tgt_original: 以有善從識故則生，從善名色、不善及無記亦如是生，識緣故稱為名色。

src_original: nāmarūpavivṛddhayā ṣaḍbhirāyatanadvārai kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante /  ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ityucyate /
tgt_original: 名色增長故，有六門作所應作等知智，名色緣故稱為六入。

src_original: tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /  yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati,
tgt_original: 六觸入故生六觸，緣此六入故稱為觸。

src_original: abhinandati,  adhyavasāyaṃ tiṣṭhati sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate /
tgt_original: 此觸生故故生受，故稱緣觸生受，領取諸緣味著故名受。

src_original: āsvādanādhyavasānādhyavasāyasthānādātmapriyarūpa-sātarūpa-viyogo mābhūditi yasya bhūyaḥ praṇidhānamiyaṃ tṛṣṇā pratyayopādānetyucyate /  evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca sa upādāna-pratyayo bhava ityucyate /
tgt_original: 緣受故稱為愛，歡悅耽著好色染味名色不能捨離，深更貪求此等，稱為愛。 緣愛故取，欲更希求後有，因身口意業故，稱取緣有。

src_original: tatkarmanirjātānāṃ pañcaskandhānām abhinirvṛttiryā sā bhavapratyayo jātirityucyate /
tgt_original: 依業故生陰，此是緣有故生。

src_original: jātyābhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayana-paripākādvināśo bhavati /  tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate/
tgt_original: 此陰生起故有熟壞，故稱生緣老死。

src_original: pūrvapūrvāṅgānāmuttarottarāṇāṃ hetutvāt,  tāni uttarodbhavāt pratyaya eva /  evamayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo-'nyonyahetukodbhūtaḥ /  dvādaśāṅgastripravṛttirnityocchedo hyanādijaḥ/  pravṛtterjaladhārāvad vartate 'nādikālikaḥ /  nānityaḥ sa tu satataṃ sthitatvāt /
tgt_original: 如是十二因緣生，更相因賴更相生長，無始輪轉無有斷絕。

src_original: avidyā ca tṛṣā karma vijñānaṃ kramaśo matāḥ /  avidyā, tṛṣṇā,  karma,
tgt_original: 無明、愛、業、識也。

src_original: vijñānañceti yathākramam /  heturvijñānabījaṃ hi /  vijñānaṃ bīja-svabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  karma kṣetramudīritam /  karma kṣetra-svabhāvatvena heturityuktam /
tgt_original: 其識種子有，為因其名色者，業及田為因，無明愛為煩惱因。

src_original: avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  karmakleśā vijñānabījatvena vyavasthitāḥ /  karmakleśā vijñānabījaṃ janayanti / tatra  karma vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karoti ca /  vijñānabījaṃ cāvidyā kirati snehanena vai /  karma tṛṣṇā tathāvidyā kṣetraṃ sneho 'vakīrṇanam /
tgt_original: 無此業煩惱故，識種子不生長。 則此因，業識種子為田，無明故散識種子，愛故潤識種子。

src_original: tatra karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ityādi tu karmaṇo 'pi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñāna-bījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi/  tṛṣṇāyā api ityādi tu evaṃ tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /  avidyāyā api ityādi tu avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakiromīti /  vijñānasyāpi ityādi tu naivaṃ bhavati ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti /
tgt_original: 其無明亦不生念言我能散識種子，愛亦不念言我能潤識種子，業亦不念言我於識為田用，識種子亦不念言我緣此等故生。

src_original: na svataḥ parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ /  īśvarādikṛtaṃ naiva svabhāvānnāpyahetutaḥ // ityuktam /  hetupratyayayorvṛttirbhāsate 'nādikālataḥ //  iti tu anādi-kālataḥ prapañca-vāsanābījasya avicchinna-nadīstrotaḥ-pravāhavad anupravṛtteḥ
tgt_original: 其地性者亦不言我能受種子、水性者亦不言我能潤種子、火性者亦不言我能熟種子、空性者亦不言我能為種子作無礙、種子亦不念言我藉此等緣能得增長。

src_original: 'atha punaḥ' iti tu abhāvādudbhava-sva-para-dvaya-īśvarādi-rahita-bīja-pṛthivyādi-sāmagryā eva aṅkurādi utpadyata iti uktam /
tgt_original: 其此芽亦非自作、亦非共作、亦非自在天作、亦非無因生，皆從地水火風空種子時節故生芽。

src_original: pañcabhirhetubhirbāhyaḥ pratītyotpāda iṣyate / iti /  pañcabhirhetubhiriti tu hetupañcakairiti,
tgt_original: 此外因緣應作五事觀察：

src_original: na ca ya evāṅkurāstadeva bījam,  bījamevāpi nāṅkuraḥ /  aniruddhād bījādapi aṅkuro notpadyate /  na ca niruddhād,
tgt_original: 非常、非斷、非傳度、藉緣故果實增廣、從相似生。

src_original: tathāpi bījanirodhe aṅkura utpadyate /  tasmān na śāśvatato,
tgt_original: 言非常者，此種滅故言非常。

src_original: na cocchedāditi na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate nācāpyaniruddhād /  api tu bījād niruddhāt tasminneva samaye 'ṅkuro utpadyate /  ato nocchedataḥ /
tgt_original: 即此時種滅、即此時芽生，以無障礙故，如稱低起，故言非斷。

src_original: na saṃkrāntitaḥ iti tu bījāṅkurau tu asadṛśau eva /  tasmāt 'na saṃkrāntitaḥ /
tgt_original: 種與芽亦不相似，故言非傳度。

src_original: parīttataḥ hetoriti- parīttabījavapanān mahāphalāvāptiriti tatparītta-hetorbahuphalābhinirvṛttiḥ,  tasmāt parīttahetormahāphalābhinirvṛtiḥ /
tgt_original: 所種種少、收子滋多，故言藉緣故果實增廣。

src_original: sadṛśānuprabodhād iti tu yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśameva phalābhinirvṛtiriti /
tgt_original: 如所種種，即生相似果，此是從相似生。

src_original: aṅkuro bījavanneṣṭo nirheturno 'ṅkurodbhavaḥ /  samo nirodha utpādas tulonnāmāvanāmavat / ityuktam /
tgt_original: 如是從花故生子，應如理安。

src_original: evam bāhyapratītyasamutpādaḥ parikalpanātmakena anupacayatvena draṣṭavyaḥ /  tathaivādhyātmikasyāpi hetuśca pratyayo dvidhā /  tathaivādhyātmikasyāpi bāhya-pratītyasamutpādavad hetupratyayākāradvayopa-nibandhanatvāt pṛthak dvividho 'vagantavyaḥ /  dvidhā hetuścapratyaya iti tu ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo hetūpanibandhanaḥ pratyayopanibandhanaśca dvayākāro 'vagantavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是外因緣，應二種觀察。 如是內因緣義，亦應二種觀察：
